title: Deaths Raise Safety Concerns Around Gene Therapy
sub_head: Prospects grow cloudy for technology just when it appeared to have turned a corner
body:
Safety scares, including deaths of several young study subjects, have set back efforts to bring more gene therapies to market, clouding one of biotechâ€™s most promising technologies and hottest sectors.
Gene therapy, which replaces defective genes, promises to deliver one-time treatment for inherited diseases. Two treatments are approved for use, while dozens are in development.
